scripts.build: npm run generate-sitemap && echo "Build completed with sitemap generation"
scripts.test-db: node -e "const mongoose = require('mongoose'); require('dotenv').config(); mongoose.connect(process.env.MONGODB_URI, {serverSelectionTimeoutMS: 10000}).then(() => {console.log('✅ الاتصال بـ MongoDB نجح'); process.exit(0);}).catch(err => {console.log('❌ فشل الاتصال بـ MongoDB:', err.message); process.exit(1);});"
